ModMetaData.name: Vanilla-Friendly Trait Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Garthor
ModMetaData.description: Adds more traits that are vanilla-friendly. The goal is for the traits to be of a power level in line with vanilla, and more interesting than just a bundle of stats. - Animal Empathy: Cannot harm animals, and cannot be harmed by animals. - Slob: Produces a lot of filth. Won't clean. - Caravaneer: Provides bonus move speed to caravans. - Boring: Bores other colonists. - Teacher: Will teach skills to other pawns. - Drunken Master: Gains large bonuses to melee combat while drunk. - Berserker: In combat, may fly into a berserk rage, becoming significantly stronger but uncontrollable. - Juggernaut: Cannot be stunned or slowed by incoming attacks.
